name: Iron Chicken
description:
This is my first game, so it would be great if after playing you leave a comment with what you found interesting and what  you found boring or annoying.

 When I start to develop this game, I thought in the typical 2D platform game, but with a diferent point of view.

I desire to create a funny game with a dyinamic system of play.

History:

A chicken that one day discover that he and his relatives are dying because of the cruelty of the humanity.

He becames in a robot chicken who is going to fight against this injustice.

Finaly here is the prototype of the game, I hope you enjoy.
